item.description:
Next meeting will be on St. Patrick's Day evening, same time 7-9PM (Tuesday, March 17th).

Our last meeting was very informative with five new attendees. We went over the medications that are now considered (by a recent study of Fibromyalgia users) to be the best and worst for Fibromyalgia. The study indicates which meds cause the least side effects and the best results.

This next meeting I will spend some time going over the basics of a detoxification plan that will help your body to heal more efficiently. I will come armed with "cheap" ways to do this and for those who like the easy way out and can afford to buy products the ones I believe work the best for Fibromyalgia sufferers either because they are targeted for the condition or work best for pain sufferers.


Small donations are greatly appreciated.

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia March Meetup
